title: Sergio Vargas
desc: I'm Sergio Vargas, the founder of this company. I have a Higher Degree in Multiplatform Application Development (DAM) and a deep passion for technology and business. Born and raised in Seville, Spain, I have always been interested in innovation and digital solutions. At 19 years old, I have developed expertise in software development, entrepreneurship, and multilingual communication. I speak three languages, which allows me to connect with a global audience and expand the company's vision internationally.
